title: High reliance on remittances
description: In 2022, personal remittances received accounted for 41.94% of Tonga's GDP, indicating a significant reliance on money sent from abroad.

title: Low external debt
description: As of 2023, Tonga's total external debt stocks were $196.45 million, one of the lowest in the world.

title: High taxes on goods and services
description: In 2023, taxes on goods and services in Tonga were 25.56% of the value added of industry and services, among the highest globally.

title: Low trademark applications
description: In 2021, only 3 trademark applications were filed by residents in Tonga, one of the lowest counts worldwide.

title: Decline in household consumption
description: Tonga experienced a -20.98% growth in household and NPISHs final consumption expenditure in 2022, indicating a significant decline.

title: Decline in per capita consumption
description: In 2022, Tonga's household and NPISHs final consumption expenditure per capita growth was -20.64%, showing a major decrease.
